p: The present work elucidates that n-hexane extract of M. oleifera seeds possesses both gram-positive as well as gram-negative bactericidal potential and thus, can be used as a therapy to treat wound infections. The n-hexane extract shows a minimum zone of inhibition of 12 mm against P.aureginosa, 14 mm against S. aureus, and 16 mm against E. coli compared to control (0 mm). The appearance of the zone of inhibition indicated that the n-hexane extract of Moringa oleifera seeds inhibited the growth of test pathogens, thereby validating the antimicrobial activity in n-hexane seed extract.
